channel.title: Camelot-PvP Revived 2.0
channel.description:
[B]Table of Content[/B] 1- Quick Facts 2- Features/Progress 3- Pictures 4- Gifs 5- Videos
[B]Quick Facts[/B] -Server Base is DSPK (PI) -Client is Nickname's Highly edited -Will be PvP based with no Training -Will have most or all of the Delta Camelot-PvP Features and More
[B]Main Features[/B]
[B]Combat Training-[/B] I got this idea from the CoD Black Ops Combat Training ;) There will be a special area with "Smart Npcs" that will act as other Pkers to help boost your Pking Skill.
[B]Server and Forums Intergration-[/B] The Server will be Intergrated with the Forums so you will need a forum account to play and also other features.
[B]602 Anims + Gfx- [/B]There is 602 Anims and some 602 Gfx in the client just for fun ;)
[B]Contracts- [/B]Simular to the CoD Black Ops Contracts, yuo can complete tasks with certin weapons within a certin amount of time to recive extra Pk Points. If you don't do them within the time you lose the Pk Points it costed to start the contract.
[B]Custom Slayer-[/B]Simular to Contracts but you get Slayer XP for killing your enemy a certin way. Ex: Kill a enemy with a DDS will give you slayer xp if that is your task.
[B]Toremented Demons(With Gfx + Anims)- [/B]The TD's are fully animated for you to try and get your Claws :)
[B]Corpal Beast-(With Gfx + Anims)-[/B] Corp is also Animated for you to try and get spirit shield drops.
[B]Full Godwars- [/B]Full Godwars with Real Godwars Maps and Npcs
[B]Custom Minigames[/B] There will be Custom PvP Based Minigames that will be created as feature updates. Ex: Search and Destroy-One person on the attacting team is turned into a gnome which has to cast a spell on a target for 5 seconds un-interupted and then defend the target for 30 seconds until the spell takes effect.
[B]Other Features[/B] Red=Not Started,Blue=In Progress,Green=Finished
In-Game Mail Linkable Accounts E-P PvP Drops (You still recive the items they had on) 63 Wave Jad Warriors Guild Ancient Curses (With Anims + Gfx) PvP Artifacts PvP Armour Chaotic Weapons Dragon Claws Bolts With Effects (With Gfx) Skillcape Emotes Fun-Pk Random Item Crate
[B]Pictures[/B]
Ancient Curse Prayer Book [img]http://img814.imageshack.us/img814/3734/ancientcurses.png[/img]
Godwars Map [img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/7237/godwars.png[/img]
Warriors Guild Map [img]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/6232/warriorsguild.png[/img]
[B]Gifs[/B]
Turmoil Gfx [img]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/9452/turmoil.gif[/img]
602 Anims [img]http://img574.imageshack.us/img574/377/anims.gif[/img]
New Teleport Gfx + Anim [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/2514/tele.gif[/img]
Working Soul Split With Gfx [img]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/7854/soulspit.gif[/img]
Curse Headicons [img]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/6255/headicons.gif[/img]
[B]Videos[/B]
None as of Now
More Media is Currently Being Uploaded :)
Please Reply on What you think of this Project so Far, Also please suggest more content for me to add or suggest how I can make something I listed above better :)

item.title: Camelot-PvP Revived 2.0
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Table of Content
1- Quick Facts
2- Features/Progress
3- Pictures
4- Gifs
5- Videos

Quick Facts
-Server Base is DSPK (PI)
-Client is Nickname’s Highly edited
-Will be PvP based with no Training
-Will have most or all of the Delta Camelot-PvP Features and More

Main Features

Combat Training- I got this idea from the CoD Black Ops Combat Training There will be a special area with “Smart Npcs” that will act as other Pkers to help boost your Pking Skill.

Server and Forums Intergration- The Server will be Intergrated with the Forums so you will need a forum account to play and also other features.

602 Anims + Gfx- There is 602 Anims and some 602 Gfx in the client just for fun

Contracts- Simular to the CoD Black Ops Contracts, yuo can complete tasks with certin weapons within a certin amount of time to recive extra Pk Points. If you don’t do them within the time you lose the Pk Points it costed to start the contract.

Custom Slayer-Simular to Contracts but you get Slayer XP for killing your enemy a certin way. Ex: Kill a enemy with a DDS will give you slayer xp if that is your task.

Toremented Demons(With Gfx + Anims)- The TD’s are fully animated for you to try and get your Claws

Corpal Beast-(With Gfx + Anims)- Corp is also Animated for you to try and get spirit shield drops.

Full Godwars- Full Godwars with Real Godwars Maps and Npcs

Custom Minigames There will be Custom PvP Based Minigames that will be created as feature updates. Ex: Search and Destroy-One person on the attacting team is turned into a gnome which has to cast a spell on a target for 5 seconds un-interupted and then defend the target for 30 seconds until the spell takes effect.

Other Features
Red=Not Started,Blue=In Progress,Green=Finished

In-Game Mail
Linkable Accounts
E-P
PvP Drops (You still recive the items they had on)
63 Wave Jad
Warriors Guild
Ancient Curses (With Anims + Gfx)
PvP Artifacts
PvP Armour
Chaotic Weapons
Dragon Claws
Bolts With Effects (With Gfx)
Skillcape Emotes
Fun-Pk
Random Item Crate

Pictures

Ancient Curse Prayer Book

Godwars Map

Warriors Guild Map

Gifs

Turmoil Gfx

602 Anims

New Teleport Gfx + Anim

Working Soul Split With Gfx

Curse Headicons

Videos

None as of Now

More Media is Currently Being Uploaded
